  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    CardMaps
    The singleton class `CardMaps` represents the collection of card maps for all players in the game.
    CardPools
    The CardPools class represents the collection of different card pools in the game.
    CardsHeld
    The CardsHeld class represents the collection of cards held by a player.
    Chat
    The Chat class manages both public and private chat messages within a lobby.
    ChatMessagesStack
    The ChatMessagesStack class represents a circular buffer for storing chat messages.
    ClientModel
    The ClientModel class represents the client-side model of the application.
    ClientModelConstants
    Constants class for defining limits and sizes related to the client-side model.
    Game
    Singleton class representing the current state of the game.
    GameOver
    Singleton class representing the game over state, including information about the winners of the game.
    Lobby
    Singleton class representing the lobby state in the client-side model.
    LobbyPreviews
    Singleton class representing the collection of lobby previews in the client-side model.
    LobbyUsers
    Singleton class representing the collection of lobby users in the client-side model.
    MyPlayer
    Singleton class representing the current player's state and information in the client-side model.
    ObjectiveCandidates
    Singleton class representing the list of objective candidates available in the client-side model.
    Observable
    The abstract class Observable represents an observable object that can be observed by observers.
    Players
    Singleton class representing the collection of players in the client-side model.
    RefreshManager
    Singleton class responsible for managing the refresh of observed components in the client-side model.
    SecretObjective
    Singleton class representing the secret objective of the player in the client-side model.
    SharedObjectives
    Singleton class representing the shared objectives in the client-side model.
